product_name: Horny Toad Willowy Button Tank Top - Women's
long_description: Forming a loose but flattering silhouette, the Horny Toad Willowy Button Tank Top features a silky, woven blend of organic cotton and lyocell and has an eye-catching pattern you'll love to wear. Blend of organic cotton and lyocell is soft, breathable and quick-drying for comfort on hot days. Organic cotton is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Bra-friendly straps, a scoop neck and 7-button front add up to your new favorite summer tank. Horny Toad Willowy Button Tank Top has a curved, droptail hem and side vents.
short_description: Forming a loose but flattering silhouette, the Horny Toad Willowy Button Tank Top features a silky, woven blend of organic cotton and lyocell and has an eye-catching pattern you'll love to wear.
